entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued February 21 at 4:53AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WARM TEMPERATURES AND RAIN FOR SOUTHWEST ALASKA... The first of two progressively warmer systems will move across Southwest Alaska from west to east today and tonight, bringing gusty southerly winds, coastal rain and interior snow.
